heading: Let’s start with the basics
intro: Finish the tasks below to get the most out of the platform
baseline-description: Unlock your dashboard and new features
ambition-description: Simulate the effect of cost-efficient low-carbon alternatives for your company
last-year-emissions-description: Two years of data enables you to compare your emission reduction rate anonymously with industry peers
customer-relationships-description: Save time by centralizing emission sharing requests from your customers from a single platform
customer-allocations-description: Standardize allocations of emissions by securely and privately storing data allocated to your customers
supplier-relationships-description: Invite your suppliers for free and develop an in-depth understanding of your supply chain’s emissions
privacy-sharing-description: Help your network to better understand your company decarbonisation strategy, by allowing them to see your public data.
task-list-modal-description: Continue exploring the platform features to unlock extra content and to get tailored insights for your company.
task-list-modal-accept: Show me what to do next
